weather.summary: Saturday: 11°C, overcast clouds. Sunday: 13°C, overcast clouds

metadata.greeting: Hey George! Get ready for a weekend of awesome adventures! We've got trains, diggers, AND dinosaurs lined up just for you – let's get muddy and explore!

activities.title: Mudchute Farm Adventure
activities.description: Explore London's biggest urban farm! See llamas, goats, and other farm animals. Great for a full day of outdoor fun.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Take a DLR train (sit at the front!) to see animals and get muddy on the farm.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Shadwell, then DLR to Mudchute, 30 mins
transport.tip: Sit at the front of the DLR for amazing views!

activities.title: Diggers and Construction at Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park
activities.description: Explore the massive playgrounds, including Tumbling Bay with sand and water. Imagine building your own construction site!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It’s like a giant construction site, perfect for a little digger fan like you!

transport.tip: Wear your wellies for splashing in Tumbling Bay!

activities.title: Hackney City Farm Animal Fun
activities.description: See pigs, goats, donkeys, and chickens up close. Enjoy a snack at the cafe and maybe even try some pottery!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Meet all your favorite farm animals right in Hackney!

transport.fromHackney: Walk or cycle, or take the 394/26 bus

activities.title: Explore the V&A East Storehouse
activities.description: See amazing visible storage displays in this brand new museum. A great way to discover hidden treasures!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Discover cool objects and maybe even some transport-related items!

transport.tip: Walk through Westfield for shops and snacks!

activities.title: Victoria Park Playground Fun
activities.description: Two fantastic playgrounds to explore, plus a boating lake and a deer enclosure. Plenty of space to run around!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Run wild in the playground and see the deer!

transport.fromHackney: Homerton Overground or Mile End tube
transport.tip: Bring bread to feed the ducks (but not too much)!

activities.title: Discover a Story at the Children's Story Centre
activities.description: Interactive storytelling, dressing up, and character visits. Let your imagination run wild!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Dress up as your favourite character and bring stories to life!

transport.tip: Check the schedule for character visits!

activities.title: Dinosaur Adventure at the Natural History Museum
activities.description: See the iconic T-Rex skeleton and explore the amazing dinosaur gallery. Don't miss the Blue Whale in Hintze Hall!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: ROAR! It's all about DINOSAURS, especially the T-Rex!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to South Kensington, 45 mins
transport.tip: Go early to avoid the crowds!

activities.title: All Aboard at the London Transport Museum
activities.description: Climb on old buses and trains, try the tube simulator, and play in the All Aboard zone. A must for transport fans!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Climb on buses and trains – it's a transport dream come true!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to Leicester Square, 40 mins
transport.tip: Get a stamper trail and collect all the stamps!

activities.title: Flight and Trains at the Science Museum
activities.description: Explore the Flight gallery and see amazing planes! Check out Making the Modern World for TRAINS! The Garden is great for under 5s.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Planes AND trains in one museum – amazing!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to South Kensington, 45 mins
transport.tip: Book tickets for Wonderlab in advance!

activities.title: Dinosaur Statues at Crystal Palace Park
activities.description: Discover the Victorian dinosaur statues on islands! Plus a farm, maze, and great playground for a full day of fun.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: See HUGE dinosaur statues in a park!

transport.tip: Pack a picnic to enjoy by the dinosaurs!

activities.title: Thames Clipper to Greenwich
activities.description: Take a real boat ride down the Thames! Enjoy the views from Tower Pier to Greenwich.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's a real boat ride! Sit outside at the back for the best views.

transport.fromHackney: Bus to Liverpool Street, then tube to Tower Hill, 30 mins
transport.tip: Sit outside at the back for the best views!

activities.title: Horniman Museum Gardens and Animals
activities.description: See the famous overstuffed walrus, explore the instruments gallery, and enjoy the excellent gardens with animals.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Lots of animals and interesting exhibits to see!

bookAhead.title: Book Ahead
bookAhead.subtitle: Coming up in the next 2-8 weeks

activities.title: Hey Duggee Live!
activities.description: See Hey Duggee and earn badges in this fun live show!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's Hey Duggee! Just like your favorite TV show.

activities.title: Peppa Pig Live
activities.description: Sing and dance with Peppa Pig and her friends in this live show!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Peppa Pig! Maybe there will be muddy puddles!

activities.title: Dinosaur World Live
activities.description: See life-size dinosaur puppets come to life on stage!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Life-size dinosaurs! Get ready to roar!

transport.tip: Some dinosaurs might be a little scary!

activities.title: Bluey's Big Play
activities.description: Based on the popular CBeebies show, Bluey's Big Play is a theatrical adaptation of the hit series.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Watch Bluey come to life on stage!

activities.title: The Gruffalo
activities.description: Watch the story of the Gruffalo come to life on stage!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: The Gruffalo is an amazing story!

activities.title: Room on the Broom
activities.description: Watch the story of the witch and her broom come to life on stage!
